r.d: Memcached is a caching daemon designed especially for dynamic web applications to decrease database load by storing objects in memory. This extension allows you to work with memcached through handy OO and procedural interfaces.
r.n: - Added memcached stats script from Harun Yayli (http://livebookmark.net/memcachephp) - Fixed server weight not being used in the session handler - Fixed PECL bug #13343 (compilation breaks with CodeWarrior compiler) - Fixed PECL bug #13546 (Session handler through unix socket) - Fixed PECL bug #14239 (Memcache::set() modifies value parameter) - Fixed PECL request #13725 (unnecessary allocations in mmc_consistent_add_server) - Changed behaviour when unserialize/uncompress fail to return false instead of failing the server
